summary: Core requested login UX changes appear implemented: /account/login now offers Google button + phone form + guest option, frontend-only session state is stored in sessionStorage and used to determine signed-in state, navigation after sign-in goes to /profile, and sign-out clears session state and returns to signed-out experience. Account/RequireAuth copy and routing were updated to match the new Google/phone wording.

hallucinated_features.description: In-app browser detection/blocking flow on the login page (InAppBrowserBlocker / isInAppBrowser) which is not part of the requested Google/phone/guest sign-in UI requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask to add an in-app browser blocker or detection logic; it only requested replacing Internet Identity UI with simple Google/phone UI and session behavior.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/account/AccountLoginPage.tsx (imports isInAppBrowser and InAppBrowserBlocker; returns blocker when detected)
